categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Jenny Cresswell is the British actress who portrayed Jenny, a woman with whom Han Solo is flirting in a deleted scene from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope alongside Harrison Ford. She is credited by John Mollo as portraying one of two "local girls" in A New Hope, as documented in the 1979 book The Art of Star Wars.
Jenny was also a hostess on the long-running UK game show Sale of the Century and appeared in numerous episodes of the hit sci-fi show Space: 1999.
More recently, Jenny was interviewed in Star Wars Insider 128 to accompany the release of the Star Wars saga on Blu-ray.
